actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of benefits payable to individuals under the supplemental security income program.

summary.text: Increases to $2,400 the amount of benefits payable to individuals under the supplemental security income program of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of benefits payable to individuals under the supplemental security income program.
